price: 33. Ma jirto dood ay (gaalada) kuula iman (si ay u duraan Nabinnimadaada), waxaannu kuu keeni (mid) Xaq ah oo ka fasiraad wanaagsan (burin waxay sheegi).
arabic: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَحۡسَنَ تَفۡسِيرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā yatūnaka bimathalin illā ji'nāka bil-ḥaqi wa-aḥsana tafsīran
